attributes.action: stop TV broadcasters dramatically increasing the volume for adverts breaks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ALL experience it, you're watching TV and the programme you are watching goes in to a break.... suddenly the its like you have sat on the Volume button on the Remote.... the Adverts start yet on a far higher volume the the TV programme you where watching.

This practise in invading peoples person space... you set the TV volume to a level that is comfortable for you and the people around you.... yet the adverts begin and TV company decides that the volume increases - the level of volume surely is of a personal preference and not one that the TV BroadCaster should be able to have too much influence on.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
